request.description:
Registers a new user.

Inserts into user table.
Logs in existing users to return an x-access-token.
Returns if there is an existing token to indicate a user is logged in.

Adds a user to a community.

Inserts into the in_community table.

Finds a user in a community.

Selects from in_community table.

Removes a user from a community.

Deletes tuple from the in_community table.

Gets an admin by username.

Selects from admin table.

Adds admin's management of communities.

Inserts into management table.

Finds admin's community management relationships by admin username.

Selects from management table.

Removes admin's mangaement of a community.

Deletes from management table.

response.name: /community
/community/:community
/message/:chid
/post
/post/community/:community
